meeting_recurrence_pattern_daily_mf: {interval, plural, =1{Occurs daily} =2{Occurs every other day} other{Occurs every # days}}
_meeting_recurrence_pattern_daily_mf.com: Text shown for meetings happening after a number of days. E.g.: Occurs every 3 days
meeting_recurrence_pattern_weekly_mf: {interval, plural, =1{Occurs every {days}} =2{Occurs every other {days}} other{Occurs every # weeks on {days}}}
_meeting_recurrence_pattern_weekly_mf.co: Text shown for meeting happening after a number of weeks. E.g.: Occurs every 3 weeks on Mon, Tue and Fri
meeting_recurrence_pattern_monthly_mf: {interval, plural, =1{Occurs every month on day {day}} =2{Occurs every other month on day {day}} other{Occurs every # months on day {day}}}
_meeting_recurrence_pattern_monthly_mf.c: Text shown for meeting happening once after a number of months. E.g.: Occurs every 3 months on day 15
meeting_recurrence_pattern_relativemonth: {interval, plural, =1{Occurs every month on {weekInMonthIndex} {weekday}} =2{Occurs every other month on {weekInMonthIndex} {weekday}} other{Occurs every # months on {weekInMonthIndex} {weekday}}}
_meeting_recurrence_pattern_relativemont: Text shown for meeting happening after a number of months. E.g.: Occurs every 3 months on second Friday
_meeting_recurrence_pattern_yearly.comme: Text shown for meeting happening every year on a date. E.g.: Occurs every February 5
_meeting_recurrence_pattern_relativeyear: Text shown for meeting happening every year on a date. E.g.: Occurs every Second Monday of June
